testcase.name: queryDocument

error.message:
Expected mime type application/octet-stream but got text/html. Apache Tomcat/7.0.78 - Error report

HTTP Status 404 - /solr/select

type Status report

message /solr/select

description The requested resource is not available.

Apache Tomcat/7.0.78
